attributes.action: We demand a National Unity Government to deal with the COVID19 emergency.
attributes.additional_details: This is not a time for individual party ideology. We face a common enemy and must unite to defeat it.
attributes.background: All political parties to unite to deal with the COVID19 emergency: its effects, measures implemented, treatment provided, and its aftermath.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
